title: Neal Asher -  The Engineer Reconditioned
description:
Neal Asher -  The Engineer Reconditioned

Written by Neal Asher
Format: MP3
Unabridged

Mysterious aliens, ruthless terrorists, androids with attitude, genetic manipulation, punch-ups with lasers and giant spaceships! What more do you want?

Person who originally created the file tried to split into chapters as well as possible, but apparently there are a few misses:

The split between "The Engineer" and "Snairls" is at The Engineer Reconditioned 07.mp3 33:19 ("The other passengers went to the cabins..."). There's no indication in the audio that it's the start of a new story.

The split between "Spatterjay" and "Jable Sharks" is at The Engineer Reconditioned 08.mp3 38:50 ("The ship: three masts stitched across the horizon..."). There's no indication in the audio that it's even the start of a new paragraph.

The split between "Jable Sharks" and "The Thrake" is at The Engineer Reconditioned 09.mp3 9:55 ("To Mark, the runcible was the altar..."). Again, no indication that it's the start of a new story.

The split between "The Thrake" and "Proctors" is at The Engineer Reconditioned 09.mp3 47:16, and the split between "Tiger Tiger" and "The Gurnard" is at The Engineer Reconditioned 12.mp3 38:15. Both of these have the story title and the author's intro
